name: @microfox/fillout
title: Fillout REST API SDK
description: TypeScript SDK for the Fillout REST API.

readme_map.description: The full README for the Fillout REST API SDK

keyInstructions.setupInfo:
To use the Fillout SDK, you need to obtain an API key from your Fillout dashboard. 

1. Log in to your Fillout account.
2. Navigate to the API settings section.
3. Generate a new API key.
4. Store this API key securely, as it will be used to authenticate your requests.

When initializing the SDK, you can provide the API key in one of two ways:

1. As an environment variable:
   Set the environment variable FILLOUT_API_KEY with your API key.

2. Directly in the SDK constructor:
   Pass the API key as a parameter when creating the SDK instance.

Example usage:

```typescript
import { createFilloutSDK } from '@microfox/fillout';

// Using environment variable
const sdk = createFilloutSDK();

// Or, passing the API key directly
const sdk = createFilloutSDK({ apiKey: 'your-api-key-here' });
```

Make sure to keep your API key confidential and never expose it in client-side code or public repositories.
